scale.title: Scale & Performance
scale.item2: Hours → Minutes: Analytics reports now ready in minutes vs hours

cost.title: Cost Optimization
cost.item1: Storage: moved historical analytics from DynamoDB to S3 Standard, cutting storage from ~US$ 500 → ~US$ 46/month for 2 TB (~91% lower) or ~US$ 200 → ~US$ 46 (~77%) vs Standard-IA
cost.item2: Query cost: with Athena at ~US$ 5/TB scanned and Parquet columnar compression, we reduced bytes scanned per report by ~12×, dropping cost from ~US$ 10 → ~US$ 0.83 per query on a 2 TB dataset (~92% cheaper), saving ~US$ 1,000 → ~US$ 83/month for ~100 queries
cost.item3: Outcome: separated OLTP from analytics, improved performance predictability, and achieved double-digit cost reductions while enabling richer historical reporting

dataLake.title: Data Lake Migration
dataLake.description: Separated OLTP from analytics by migrating historical data from DynamoDB to S3 + Athena with Parquet format. Achieved 12× compression ratio and columnar optimization for faster, cheaper queries.

tagService.description: Built robust EPC generation and serialization system with batch processing, TTL management, and hardware integration for industrial RFID printers and readers.
